thread.title: Former teen model accuses magician Copperfield of sexual assault

title: Former teen model accuses magician Copperfield of sexual assault
text:
Former teen model accuses magician Copperfield of sexual assault Friday, January 26, 2018 - 01:03 
A former teen model has accused illusionist David Copperfield of drugging and sexually assaulting her in 1988 after he judged a modeling competition in Japan that she took part in. Jane Ross reports.   
A former teen model has accused illusionist David Copperfield of drugging and sexually assaulting her in 1988 after he judged a modeling competition in Japan that she took part in. Jane Ross reports.  //reut.rs/2ncG92d
